mapper.select: SELECT V.RSV_ID , D.MNG_ID , VHC_INFO.VHC_ID , VHC_NO , CHAS_NO , CORP_INFO.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM , DL_CD6.DL_CD_NM AS AREA_NM , DL_CD5.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , RELS_DATE , MODEL_NM , DL_CD.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , DL_CD2.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE_NM , DL_CD3.DL_CD_NM AS LF_YN_NM , DL_CD4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL_NM , VHC_INFO.REMARK , VHC_INFO.USE_YN FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CORP_INFO ON VHC_INFO.CORP_ID = CORP_INFO.CORP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD ON VHC_INFO.VHC_KIND = DL_CD.DL_CD AND DL_CD.CO_CD = 'VHC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD2 ON VHC_INFO.VHC_TYPE = DL_CD2.DL_CD AND DL_CD2.CO_CD = 'VHC_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD3 ON VHC_INFO.LF_YN = DL_CD3.DL_CD AND DL_CD3.CO_CD = 'LF_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD4 ON VHC_INFO.VHC_FUEL = DL_CD4.DL_CD AND DL_CD4.CO_CD = 'VHC_FUEL' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD5 ON VHC_INFO.MAKER = DL_CD5.DL_CD AND DL_CD5.CO_CD = 'VHC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD6 ON VHC_INFO.AREA = DL_CD6.DL_CD AND DL_CD6.CO_CD = 'AREA' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON VHC_INFO.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID AND D.DVC_KIND = 'CD005' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VOC_RSV_RST V ON D.MNG_ID = V.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' WHERE VHC_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.MNG_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY VHC_INFO.VHC_ID ASC
